item.title: Carrie add a quote by Carl Sagan
item.description: "You're an interesting species. An interesting mix. You're capable of such beautiful dreams, and such horrible nightmares. You feel so lost, so cut off, so alone, only you're not. See, in all our searching, the only thing we've found that makes the emptiness bearable, is each other." -- Carl Sagan

item.title: Carrie add a quote by Melina Marchetta
item.description: "If I want more, I need to go and get it, demand it, take hold of it with all my might, and do the best I can with it." -- Melina Marchetta

item.title: Carrie add a quote by Melina Marchetta
item.description: "Oh God, Frankie, I breathe in rhythm with that man. You think that's not my flesh and blood after all these years?" -- Melina Marchetta

item.title: Carrie add a quote by Melina Marchetta
item.description: "Once she made him watch Pride and Prejudice and for ages he would re-word Mr Bingley's apology to Jane Bennet, saying, 'I've been an inexplicable fool', for anything from losing his keys to burping out loud. Her reply to anything she wanted to do was Jane Bennet's response to Bingley's marriage proposal, 'A thousand times yes." -- Melina Marchetta

item.title: Carrie add a quote by Melina Marchetta
item.description: "He stops and looks at me. 'I'm here because of you. You're my priority. Your happiness, in some fucked way, is tuned in to mine. Get that through your thick skull. Would I like it any other way? Hell, yes, but I don't think that will be happening in my lifetime." -- Melina Marchetta

item.title: Carrie add a quote by Melina Marchetta
item.description: "It's a weird smile, but it reaches his eyes and I bottle it. And I put it in my ammo pack that's kept right next to my soul and Justine's spirit and Siobhan's hope and Tara's passions. Because if I'm going to wake up one morning and not be able to get out of bed, I'm going to need everything I've got to fight this disease that could be sleeping inside of me." -- Melina Marchetta

item.title: Carrie add a quote by Melina Marchetta
Carrie add a quote by Elizabeth Wein
item.description: "It's like being in love, discovering your best friend." -- Elizabeth Wein
